To setup Bangle.js complete the following instructions:
1. Setup your Bangle.js with Gadgetbridge (complete "How to setup" and "Extra setup")
2. Click on the "gear" icon next to your device in Gadgetbridge
3. Enable "Allow Internet Access"
4. Enable "Allow Intents"
5. Click "App loader URL" and enter the URL provided to you!
6. Go back
7. Install the "dec4IoT Companion" from the App loader (the Icon with 9 squares)
8. Start the app on Bangle.js!
